summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 12th Avenue Northeast from East 45th Street to East 47th Street; by widening the existing paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 18035 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
